# Birding App Development Instructions

This is a full stack birding application with React frontend and Node.js backend.

## Project Structure

- `frontend/` - React application for bird watchers
- `backend/` - Node.js/Express API server

## Development Guidelines

- Use React with modern hooks and functional components
- Follow REST API patterns for backend endpoints
- Implement responsive design for mobile bird watching
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Follow ESLint and Prettier formatting rules

## Bird Watching Features

- Bird identification and logging
- Location-based sightings
- Photo upload capabilities
- Species information database
- Personal birding journal

## Code Style

- Use TypeScript when possible
- Implement proper error handling
- Add comprehensive testing
- Use semantic commit messages
